question: Which international energy major is set to acquire 20 per cent stake in Adani Green Energy Ltd?
explanation:
The France headquartered energy major Total is set to acquire 20 % stake in Adani Green Energy Ltd (AGEL), the renewable energy arm of Adani Group.
This would be the 3rd partnership of Adani group with Total. Earlier, Total acquired 37.4 % in Adani Gas and 50 % in Dhamra LNG project of Adani.
